ITEM.SHORT_TXT: Index &1~&2 does not have any discriminant field. Check is statistics.
ITEM.LONG_TXT: U1&CAUSE& ASThe index &MSGV1&~&MSGV2& has fields with only one distinct value. Such index is useless U1&SYSTEM_RESPONSE& ASThe index consumes storage without providing any effectiveness. U1&WHAT_TO_DO& ASCheck the index's statistics, using transaction ST05 => Enter SQL Statement ASEnter the following SQL statement: ASSELECT * FROM &MSGV1& ASPress button "Explain", on the explain plan double-click on the table " = &MSGV1&" next to the text "TABLE ACCESS FULL", search for the statistics of your index, all field distinct value should be 1. ASIf all table rows seems incorrect, please update table statistics and redo the controls. U1&SYS_ADMIN& AS
